unnormalised: Hey, did you know Dr. Rao at AIIMS is doing research on gene editing for thalassemia? Apparently, they're targeting the HBB gene, saw the article in the newspaper on 20/07/24.
normalised: Hey, did you know Doctor Rao at A-I-I-M-S is doing research on gene editing for thalassemia? Apparently, they are targeting the H-B-B gene, saw the article in the newspaper on twentieth july twenty twenty four.
